name: fatalist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who believes that people cannot change the way events will happen and that events, especially bad ones, cannot be avoided: "I'm not a fatalist ," she said. "I'm a realist." It's wrong to take this fatalist's view of global warming. See
fatalism
More examplesFewer examplesThe fatalists will point out that mathematically the team could still win or lose."I'm a fatalist. I believe things are meant to be," she declared.He urged delegates to prove the fatalists wrong, and win the election.
